meta_info.DATAVERSE_WHITE_BOARD: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DATAVERSE_WHITE_BOARD ( TENANT_ID VARCHAR(100), TENANT_NAME   VARCHAR(100),CITY VARCHAR(100), ZIP NUMBER(9), CREATED_DATE  DATE, UPDATED_DATE  DATE ) CLUSTER BY (TENANT_ID) COMMENT = 'The R2_DATAVERSE_WHITE_BOARD Dummy table for flow testing by Sudhir';
